bike.description: Pat Laughlin Signature Model, 100% Cr-Mo Seamless Tubing, Double Butted Main Frame, Integrated Seat Clamp, Integrated Head Tube, Externally Machined Mid BB, Drilled for Removable Rotor Tabs, Cable Guides & Brake Mounts

components.description: 3-pc 48-Spline Cr-Mo 175mm, Mid Sealed Bearing, 25T Alloy Bubble Sprocket
King Kong Sealed Bearing Alloy 36H 3/8" Female F & 14mm R Hubs w/ Alex BH20 36H F & DM22 R Double Wall Rims, 9T Driver
Light Weight Tioga Street Block, 20 x 2.25" F & R
Tektro FX730, U-Brake, Linear Pull, Soft Compound Shoes
SE CNC Front Load Dual Cap, Side Cutouts, 6061 T-6 Alloy
Big Daddy Jackhammer Grip w/ Rubber SE End Plugs
Lightweight SE Seat/Post Combo w/ Thin Padding
